All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdultPriceTicket
 
ChildrenPriceTicket
Represents a child ticket that can be bought by moviegoers.
Cinema
Represents a cinema found within a cineplex.
CinemaClassType
 
Cineplex
Represents a cineplex containing cinemas.
DataOperator
This class is responsible for interacting with the database (text files).
FileInputOutputOperator
This class is responsible for the direct interaction with the user.
FirstStartUp
 
MainMenuView
This is the MainMenuView class, which is the entry point of the application and is always the first view that the user of this system will see.
MainMovieListingView
This is the base View class for listing movies.
MainSearchMovieView
This is the base View class for listing options by which movies can be filtered or search.
MainTop5MovieView
This is an abstract View class which provides the implementation of presenting top 5 movies.
MainTop5MovieView.Top5MoviesOption
This is an enum which defines the criteria by which the top 5 movies are calculated.
MovieDetailView
This View class presents the details of a particular Movie object
MovieGoerBookingFilterView
This View class is responsible for getting the filter mode from the user and filter the showtimes accordingly
MovieGoerBookingHistoryView
This class is responsible for showing the booking history that has been made by a movie-goer
MovieGoerBookingShowTimeView
This class is primarily responsible for showing the users the list of available showtimes
MovieGoerMainView
This View class is the main menu for the movie-goer
MovieGoerMovieListingView
This View class is responsible for printing the list of movies in the movie-goer module
MovieGoerPurchaseView
This View class is primarily responsible for facilitating the booking and purchasing of tickets from movie-goer
MovieGoerReviewingView
This View class is responsible for getting review from the movie-goer
MovieGoerReviewView
This View class helps to list reviews for a particular movie
MovieGoerSearchMovieView
This View class presents for movie-goer the various options, each representing a method of listing ore searching movies
MovieGoerSeatingView
This View class is primarily responsible for facilitating the process of choosing of seats by the movie-goer before proceeding for booking.
MovieGoerTop5MovieView
This View class is responsible for showing top 5 movies (by sales or rating) for the movie-goer module
MovieGoerViewMovieView
This BaseView class presents the various options for users for a given selected movies, such as booking of tickets or leaving reviews.
MovieRating
enumerates the different maturity ratings of a movie.
Movies
Represents a movie that is screened in a cinema.
MovieStatus
enumerates the different showing statuses of a movie.
MovieType
enumerates the different movie types.
PriceCalculator
This class is responsible for setting the prices of tickets based on various factors.
PricingOperator
This class is responsible for calculating the ticket prices based on the various factors.
PublicHoliday
Represents a public holiday for price increments.
Review
Represents a review made by a moviegoer.
Seat
Represents a seat in the cinema.
SeatLayout
Represents the seat layout within a cinema.
SeniorPriceTicket
Represents a senior citizen ticket that can be bought by moviegoers.
ShowTime
Represents a showtime for a movie screening in a cinema.
Staff
Represents an administrator that uses the MOBLIMA application.
StaffAddMovieView
This View class is responsible for facilitating the process of admin creating new movie into the movie database
StaffEditMovieDetailsView
This View class is responsible for admin to change the information of a movie in the database
StaffMainView
This View is the main menu for the admin module
StaffMovieListingView
This View class is responsible for listing movies in the admin module
StaffPHView
This class is responsible for handling the setting of public holidays as part of the system settings.
StaffSearchMovieView
This View class presents for admin the various options, each representing a method of listing ore searching movies
StaffShowTimeView
This View class is responsible for facilitating with admin adding new showtime to database or removing existing showtime from the database
StaffSystemSettingsView
This View class is responsible for handling the configuration of system settings by the admin/
StaffTop5MovieView
This View class is responsible for listing the top 5 movies in the admin module
StartView
This is the base View class.
Ticket
Represents a ticket bought by moviegoers.
Transaction
Represents an order made by a moviegoer.
ViewOperator
This class helps to manage the flow of all the View object in the application.
